entry.string: Missing parameter [#(1)] for API function [#(2)] in module [#(3)].
entry.translation: Meessing peremeter [#(1)] fur EPI fooncshun [#(2)] in mudoole-a [#(3)].

entry.string: Unable to locate file [#(1)]. Are you sure it's there??
entry.translation: Uneble-a tu lucete-a feele-a [#(1)]. Ere-a yuoo soore-a it's zeere-a??

entry.string: Cannot read and/or write to file [#(1)]. File will be read from and deleted afterwards. Please ensure that this application has sufficient access to do so.
entry.translation: Cunnut reed und/oor vreete-a tu feele-a [#(1)]. Feele-a veell be-a reed frum und deleted effterverds. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Pleese-a insoore-a thet thees eppleeceshun hes sooffffeecient eccess tu du su.

entry.string: FileId [#(1)] does not exist. File [#(2)] does not have a corresponding metadata entry in the databsae.
entry.translation: FeeleId [#(1)] dues nut ixeest. Um de hur de hur de hur. Feele-a [#(2)] dues nut hefe-a a currespundeeng metedeta intry in zee detebsee-a.

entry.string: Unable to truncate file [#(1)] in database.
entry.translation: Uneble-a tu trooncete-a feele-a [#(1)] in detebese-a.

entry.string: Unable to save file contents to database.
entry.translation: Uneble-a tu sefe-a feele-a cuntents tu detebese-a.

entry.string: Cannot read and/or write to file [#(1)]. File will be read from and deleted afterwards. Please ensure that this application has sufficient access to do so.
entry.translation: Cunnut reed und/oor vreete-a tu feele-a [#(1)]. Feele-a veell be-a reed frum und deleted effterverds. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Pleese-a insoore-a thet thees eppleeceshun hes sooffffeecient eccess tu du su.
